feed.title: CGKlab
feed.subtitle: The goal of the CGKlab is to identify the neurological mechanisms that underlie stress-induced vulnerability in the development of substance use disorders, and in doing so, rationally design pharmacotherapeutic treatments. The lab uses a preclinical rodent model to understand how an acute stressful event can lead to addiction, not only facilitating drug self-administration but also precipitating relapse.

entry.title: Github launch
entry.content:
CGK lab is excited to launch üöÄ today our GitHub, featuring CellSelect-3DMorph. A forked code from its predecessor 3DMorph that reconstructs cells from 3D images and analyzes their morphology! üî¨ CellSelect_3DMorph

CellSelect adds the possibility to select full cells that we want to continue with the analysis and eliminate the incomplete ones (for example cells in the x, y, or z border).

Also, in our GitHub repository, you can find a Calcium Imaging Pipeline using Jupyter notebook and their new updates. https://github.com/CGK-Laboratory.
